amendment.description: To provide for a renewable production of hydrogen demonstration and commercial application program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1392 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1392 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S9941-9942; text: CR S9941) To provide for a renewable production of hydrogen demonstration and commercial application program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1392 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Harkin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1392 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
